title: Learning is the Solution
description: Website to provide free online books for kids ages 4-9. The best showcase of my skills as a developer. Click 'More Info' below to learn more!

title: Online Book Maker
description: Currently developing app to create online books visually.  App exports JSON instructions to create books using React components.

title: Online Science Curriculum
description: Combines most popular homeschool science curriculums into a single curriculum accessible online.  Was initial plan for Learning is the Solution before switching focus to online character books.

title: Gravity Simulator
description: Simulates gravity given different environmental conditions.  Created using pure JavaScript, then re-implemented using Phaser 3.

title: Technician Team Improvement
description: Tasked with improving performance of a team of 15 technicians. Over 2 years drove significant improvements to tool down time, cost savings, and documentation, leading to overall performance improvement of 23%.

title: Pneumatic Lines Upgrade
description: A toolset had long-term issue of air leaks in the pneumatic lines. Found deceptively simple solution - replacing lines with chemical resistant PFA. Reduced tool downs by 30% and avoided costly redesign.

title: Robotic Wet Hood Redesign
role: Team Lead and Lead Software/Hardware Designer
description: Redesigned a toolset, including the design of the software and hardware for a new robot controller. Saved $132k/yr in damaged product/equipment. Presented at 2018 worldwide innovation competition and placed 10th/450.

title: Tool Monitoring Software
description: Used TI's Tool Interdiction Monitoring System (TIMS) to create tool monitoring software for several toolsets, including furnaces and hoods.  Monitored tool data to catch and interdict if something goes wrong.

title: Equipment State Management Software
description: Each of the 400+ tools in the factory is in a 'state'.  For example, ready to run, needs maintenance, currently running, etc.  Created an internal website that allows technicians and operators to more effectively manage these states.

title: Wafer Transfer Redesign
role: Team Lead and Lead Software/Hardware Designer
description: Redesigned a toolset, including improving the software and adding temperature detection. Saved $145k/yr in damaged product/equipment. Presented at 2017 worldwide innovation competition and placed 3rd/400.

title: TI Leadership Development Program
description: Completed 3 year program intended to take a hand-picked group of top engineering talent from across the country and develop them into robust engineers who could thrive in any environment.

title: Chip Testing Software Development
description: Debugged software used to test chips, improving 40 programs and saving $130k/yr. Developed software to analyze test data, find cost saving opportunities, and detect possible bugs.

title: Chip Tracking Software
description: Lead team to improve software used for tracking the path of chips throughout the factory.  Significantly improved data integrity and tracking capabilities.

title: EWB Rose-Hulman Chapter Improvement
description: As President, transformed group from a 6-member, one-project chapter into a 25-member, two-project chapter. Restructured organization to empower each member with clear expectations and a future growth path. Presented to university leadership board and received ongoing $50k/yr grant.

title: Latrine Construction in Impoverished Community
role: EWB Chapter President and Project Lead
description: Dominican Republic community was afflicted with disease due to poor sanitation. Lead project to construct latrines in the community and teach them how to construct their own latrines. Since completion, infection rate has reduced 40%.

title: Clinic Construction in Impoverished Community
role: EWB Chapter Vice President and Project Co-Lead
description: Dominican Republic community had limited access to affordable healthcare. Co-lead project to renovate an existing structure into a clinic that would be staffed by a local non-governmental organization (NGO). Clinic provides free healthcare to hundreds of people every week.
